评论详情: I have had trouble before finding a legging with enough length in the rise and a high enough waist band.  These are perfection...and at a great price too.  I am 5 ft 5 and 123 pounds . I ordered a medium which is snug enough to stay put but very comfortable.  My new go-to choice!
This are supposed to be 7/8 leggings. They come up to your knees. Super big. I am only 5’6 so no reason to be that short. I do not know who they paid to get a 4 star rating but they are terrible!
These fit perfectly. Wear well!  Very sexy!!!
I LOVE these leggings. They have pockets and are really high rise which I like. They are really comfy. I like the material because dog fur just wipes right off. Definitely ordering another pair.
These are my favorite they stay put don't ride up or down and made good
The fit, the belly control, the lack of a muffin top. They’re a perfect fit.

Aside from the fact they have an odd flare at the knee, right out of the bag they had a terrible odor. Not like they had been worn, but reminded me of the old leather sandals from India--that had been cured in urine. Just nasty.  Was not going to take a chance washing would eliminate the smell since once laundered, I'd be stuck with them.  Back they go.
I wear a 2xl and ordered a XXL and they fit perfectly.  Wished I ordered more colors when they were on sale.
Great leggings , runs true to size, great support !! Fabric quality is superb . They maintain their shape thru each wearing . Will order more !

评论概述: Great color and not see through!
评论详情: I have been on a mission for hot pink leggings that aren't see through and these are IT! The material is nice. I wish the waistband was a bit thicker. They do make a little bit of a swoosh sound when you walk but it's not too noticeable. The color is great and they held up during a workout.
Love the color fits good

I've never owned a pair of active wear spandex anything.  I didn't want to sink a bunch of $ into it so I went with these as the reviews were good.  I was blown away by these.  They remind me of a really good fitting pair of support hose.  They compress well so no jiggle which is a good thing.  Handy pocket perfect for cell phone.  They are certainly long enough.  I'm 5'7" and they go several inches below my knee.  Certainly comfy for my morning walking.  I bought the 1X even though Amazon recommended the XL.  Glad I did.  I wear an 18-20.
Too small
These Capri leggings are terrific. They fit perfectly. And I love the little design in them. They go really well with an olive green top. They are one of my favorites.

评论概述: My new go to gym pants/leggings.
评论详情: Great design, fits well (S), reasonably priced.
Comfortable.  Look nice.  Good price.
Look great, fit great, nice material!
I love it.
Absolutely love these. Super comfortable and gorgeous color!
They were very comfortable, and I like them a lot

评论概述: There's better out there below this price point
评论详情: I received this Amazon Essentials Women's Active Sculpt High Rise Capri Legging with Pockets in good condition. I ordered the "Purple" color variation which is more of like a lavender hue, and it looks exactly like it is pictured on here. I sized down to a Medium, forgetting that some other activewear that I ordered from Amazon was true to size, so that's my mistake. They were definitely too small on me, so I say stick to your regular sizing. That being said, I didn't really care for the leggings otherwise. The material feels very thin, and although not sheer, does seem to cling to areas I'd rather not call attention to. Additionally, the stretch felt minimal, and almost compression like. They were just okay, and I know from past experience that Amazon offers other great activewear, but these were not it.

I love these so much I'm about 5'8 and 333lbs and originally ordered the 4x just because I have had fits with other leggings. The 4x was a little big but still comfy and do not roll down which was my biggest concern. I went to the 3x and they are perfect. They are just thick enough with a little compression to be the best quality for the price.

I took a chance and I have to say, I really like 'em. The high waist (something I didn't think I'd like), covers a multitude of sins, stays in place, and isn't restrictive. I ordered a medium (5'5", #140) and I'm happy with the fit. I notice I am not tugging at the waistband, or the legs, as I do with some other brands. They also feel like they tend to flow with me instead of against me.
Wife loved them

评论概述: Great fit and pockets for my phone
评论详情: Love the comfy fit and pockets on both sides for phone or other accessories
Comfort and color
Color was just as I wanted it and the fit was great.
I wish I would have ordered a smaller size, but I still love them! The pockets aren’t too low like most athletic leggings are.
These leggings are pretty soft and stretchy.  They stay up well in the gym.  My only complaint is that the material is kind of slippery and I don't like that when I'm working out.
Very nice but run big. Love them though!😉💗
Shows all your lumps and bumps
Medium compression. Nice fit.
I’m 5’9”, 130 lbs, too small and uncomfortable

This is a well-made pair of leggings.  They are super stretchy but I think that they run a little big, I have to pull them way higher than my waist for the crotch to fit correctly but they slide back down.  The pockets on the side are perfect for carrying my cell phone and keys.  The legs are the perfect length for capri’s and the elastic on the calves are not too tight but stays put. Nice pants but they slide down.
LOVE THESE! these fit amazing and are SO SO soft!!! They stay up and hold everything in place. I am very happy with these. They wash well in the washer and dryer. No issues!

Fit strangely too tight especially the bottom and I wear a size 0 or 2. I have the full length leggings in this brand in the heavier material and lighter material and love both of those so not sure why these fit so tight
Was really hoping to like these but they definitely disappointed. The fit is way off making them uncomfortable. They are also heavy material. Not at all ideal for working out and sweating.
I like my leggings to be slightly big. I ordered a 4x and these are the perfect fit. So now I need to order the rest of the colors they offer.

There are Ladies Capri leggings. They are made well from a soft stretchy material. They are true to size so you can order your normal size.  My favorite thing is that they have pockets. I’m really happy with the way they fit me and how nice they look when wearing them. They are machine washable and still look great after numerous washings. If your looking for great looking affordable capris, I highly recommend these. I love everything about them.
I have no idea how this product got a 4-5 star. It is see though. Cheaply made.  Will be returning
Great material well made very comfortable

These workout capris are stretchy and supportive without creating a muffin-top. They are very comfortable and I like the side pockets.  They come just below the knee on me, but I am 5 ft 11”. They are made of the same tour of materials as much more expensive versions. Without any noticeable flaws or other issues, I would definitely consider buying again.

I typically wear anywhere from a size 14-16 depending on the manufacturer. Sometimes a large fits me and sometimes I need an X-large. I ordered these in an X-large and they fit me comfortably.  The fabric is a nice weight that you can't see through. It is on the slick-ish shiny side but I like that because I always wear Tunic-style tops that fall over my fanny and they don't tend to stick to shinier fabrics.  High-rise and comfort is always a must for me (I'm nearly 70) and these fit comfortably,... higher up on my waist where I like them.  Overall I'm very pleased with these. They're reasonably priced and well-made.
Wore this to Zumba class, first entry I got a compliment. Made me feel even better. Was so comfortable, the side pockets are great, love this!
I got these to wear under a "dress" that I wear as a long shirt as I'm tall. The are so comfy and I love the color. I have wore them more than planned because they are just nice.

评论概述: Too short so the climb up my calves
评论详情: I really like the fabric and fit of these except that they are just too short (I'm 5'7" 197 lbs) so that they climb up my old, unflattering calves and bunch below my knees.  The first size I ordered XXL were way too big, XL fit except for being too short, They're fine when I first put on but they wont stay down.  If your petite and/or don't have my issues, you will really like these.

I had to give these crop leggings a shot, as you can never have too many pairs of black leggings. I LOVE them. The fit is perfect and true to size (I ordered a small, I'm 5'3" 133). The material is soft and so comfortable. The high waist is just high enough without being awkward high. They're easy to move around in for workouts! They have side pockets, but they lay flat and don't pop out awkwardly like others I have tried. Oh! And the material is not see through at all, so safe to squat it 🙌 very very happy with the quality of these!

I love the way these fit.  I think these may be my first high rise leggings but they won't be my last.  I really like the extra coverage.  The capri length is good, hits my calfs right where it should.  The material is soft and smooth.  These leggings are not constrictive at all and they are perfect for my morning workouts.
Fit is great Now for conservative me I need to go of my element and go out with them on
These fit fantastic! The fabric is really soft and breathable. I'd highly recommend them.

Nothing bad to say about these Amazon Essentials High Rise Capri Leggings. They were a tad bit snug fitting in the waist but I’m not going to complain about that because my waist measurements might have been an inch or two off. Size chart is accurate so please check before ordering. Good quality material. I’m happy that they come in plus size and that they actually fit nicely. I ordered the black but in my opinion it’s more of a dark gray. Pockets big enough for my keys and cellphone. Would definitely recommend.

These leggings fit well and are very comfortable. They are lightweight with a silky feel. There are 2 quite large side pockets, so I can carry my phone, keys, license etc.  (size L, 150 lbs. 5’7”, I didn’t want them overly tight.)
These are a good fit & comfortable.

These are really nice capri leggings. Good stretch and decent thickness. The material has a shine to it, but not too much. The pockets are a great size.  I am a 8/10 in womens, weight ranges between 135 to 140 lbs. Size large fit me comfortably.

Personally, these leggings are much higher quality and 10x more flattering than I had anticipated. I typically go for seamless leggings, but I don't have any complaints with the seams/stitching of these in particular.  The purple color is slightly different, but not as dark as the photo is appearing.  I got a size xsmall and they hug very nicely in the right areas - not too tight or too loose.  These leggings are very reasonably priced if you ask me which is always a plus!

Remember a couple years ago when we were all flocking to Amazon for the align dupes? Can confirm these leggings are even better. My husband even asked if they were Lulu. They feel like a second skin, have deep pockets, and great compression and shape retention. Just like the luxtreme fabric. They come up nice and high too! They’re a crop length which is great for warmer weather days. I’m so sorry ordering these leggings in other colors (:

I got the lavender ones and it's a great shade. Color aside, they are comfy, easy to care for and have deep pockets so you can carry your keys, gym pass or any other item you need when you're on the go.

评论概述: Great quality. Order your regular size.
评论详情: I normally wear a size large in leggings, but lately have been disappointed by a couple of brands that run very small. So I thought I'd be clever and order up, but in this Amazon Essentials brand, the next size up is too large for me. So these do run true to size and I recommend ordering your regular size for a comfortable fit. The fabric is nice and stetchy and of great quality; it is fairly thick and passes the squat test, for sure. The fabric has a slight sheen and is very smooth as opposed to a brushed, cottony feel. The waistband fits securely and does not slip down, despite the size I ordered being a size too big. And of course these have the all-important side pockets that perfectly fit a cell phone. How did we ever get by before, without the cell phone pockets? These machine wash and dry with no issues, and come out of the dryer looking brand new with no shrinking, fading or pilling.  Overall these are terrific basic capri leggings that are well priced but of great quality. You'll wear them again and again. I recommend ordering your regular size for a comfortable fit and perhaps sizing down if you want a more compressive fit.
The material is so very soft and feels amazing! These fit great and don't feel like they are falling down after a few hours - which is so nice. I really like the 2 deep pockets as well.

I like these capri leggings because they’re really comfortable.  They’re very well made and are reinforced in the right places.  They have pockets on both sides that are nice sized and plenty deep.  My pro max phone fits with room to spare.  I got the large, which is my usual size, and they have a lot of stretch.  I could have probably got the medium and been fine.  So you might consider sizing down a size, especially if you’re between sizes.  I recommend them.

评论概述: High rise capri spandex leggings with pockets
评论详情: They are a little snug I ordered XL used the size chart and kind of guessed. It will probably fit better when I lose a few more pounds so I'm not going to complain much. They feel a little low in the crotch but if you want breathing room down there, there is some unless you can make them sit where usual leggings do. I wish there was a little more compression in the tummy though, even though they are snug they don't feel like that compression hug actually gives. They do have nifty pockets though and of course I can't wait to lose 20 more pounds, and I will try them on again each 5 I lose and see if I can wear them the way I like too. Do they rate as high as Old Navy ones, not quite. Not bad, are they good enough- I say yes.

评论概述: The pattern is printed on rich blue, not cheap white, fabric
评论详情: I am ~140 lbs and 5'6". I wear a US 6 or generally a Medium in things like leggings. These shiny leggings in a Medium fit me just fine, perhaps even a tiny bit looser than I was expecting. Bonus points for pockets.  My favorite thing about these leggings is that the fabric isn't white underneath, which is absolutely the sign of quality. These are blue underneath, which means you can bend and squat knowing the pattern and color are not going to look washed out and cheap when you do.  I wish they were like 2 inches longer, because they tend to shift up to the bend in my knees.
Comfy, but not compression leggings. Had a sag after wearing for an hour. If you want them to fit tighter, I'd order a size down!
A nice pair of capris and fit true to size.

These Capri workout leggings are super cute and very comfortable. They’re great for me to wear to the gym and also to wear on days when I walk to the park. These capris have aide pockets and have a high waist fit for tummy control. The fabric is very soft/breathable and come very highly recommended for purchase for a comfortable fit and great look.

评论概述: Great capri leggings at a fair price
评论详情: I really like these capris but unfortunately they are too big. I should have ordered L or XL but XXL are way too big. I must have accidentally ordered the wrong size, because I never take XXL in pants. But they're too nice not to wear so I'll be wearing them around the house and yard and maybe some very casual occasions.  I received these well-made pants quickly. I love the feel of the material (74% polyester/26% elastane). The seams are all well sewn, no loose threads, and the stress points are reinforced. I love the two side pockets, they are a big plus in my book.  I highly recommend these capri leggings!

Really impressed with these Amazon essentials capri leggings. The quality is really good especially for the price and they fit TTS. They are made of 74% Polyester, 26% Elastane and has two side pockets. These are just as good as high-end leggings for a fraction of the price and I will be ordering more! I recommend.

评论概述: Looking for cute Capri leggings with pockets?
评论详情: Looking for cute Capri leggings with pockets? My wife loves these cute Capri leggings because they have pockets. The pockets are large enough to securely fit her phone and some dog treats. Nothing else needed! The fabric is soft and stretchy. She wears a medium in most clothing and she said they fit true to size. Additionally, the pants are machine washable in cold water. (see photos).  Recommended

FYI The fabric has a slightly shiny appearance.  They seem to be well made and are super comfortable!Lots of stretch, so order your usual size or possibly downsize depending on how snug you like your leggings.  I wear a size 14 in jeans and Large was a perfect fit with a slightly snug feel.
Klasse hochsitzende figurfreundliche Caprileggins.
Ganz schlechte Qualität.
Habe lt. Vorschlag Gr. XL gewählt, da ich schon mehrere Artikel in dieser Größe habe. Trage Gr. 38/40. Diesmal entspricht die Größe ca. einer 42/44. Ich musste sie retournieren.
Super confort, la taille correspond parfaitement, et il est chouette !! Juste top!!
Hose wie beschrieben, passt und ist schön.
Fit is great but these are not black and white but green!
El estampado es discreto, la licra super cómoda, no transparenta, los bolsillos tienen un tamaño perfecto.
Schöne kräftige Farbe , angenehmes Material
Great fit excellent quality wash up well.
Eigentlich hatte ich mir die Hose nur für sportliche Aktivitäten gekauft . Der Stoff ist sehr angenehm und sitzt perfekt . Ich trage sie jetzt auch in der Freizeit .
Sehr bequem, angenehmes Material

I pretty much live in leggings and am forever looking to replace a legendary pair that served me for 7 years. I was first a bit unnerved by the elastic band at the top of the waist but surprisingly it hasn't been bothering me and actually does the job of keeping the leggings up without compressing my insides. After a few washes the material is absolutely fine, the pockets are roomy and the leggings work both for leisure, gym type exercise and running. Considering another pair.
Die Leggings ist echt toll, auch die Farbe Pink. 1 Nummer kleiner bestellen als normal, dann ist alles prima.

Die Yogahose ist gut verarbeitet ohne störende Nähte, das Material ist weich und angenehm auf der Haut, festelastisch ohne einzuschnüren und blickdicht! Bestellte Größe XL bei Hüftumfang 105 cm sitzt bei mir leider deutlich zu locker und die Hose ist insgesamt zu groß für mich. Schade!

Wow, die sitzt wirklich perfekt bei 168cm und Gr S 36. Ein sehr schönes Flieder/Blau. Interessante Farbe die es nicht so oft gibt. Der Stretch Stoff ist hochwertig und etwas dicker bzw normal (so wie er sein sollte) Ich würde jederzeit noch andere Farben bestellen. Ebenfalls gut das sie bis zum Bauchnabel geht. Ich bin zwar schlank aber ich finde es beim Sport oder Freizeit bequemer, toller highwaist Style.
